description.en: Have you ever pitied someone with positive intentions, yet your actions had negative results? Recchan, a high school girl with a monster face is popular among her classmates, yet what they believe is pity for her only ends in her disliking. The student council president however sees otherwise, finding jealousy and personal morals to differentiate her view on how to treat the girl with a monster face. Yet what others may see as a subjectively wrong view of the girl, refusing to care because of pity, only serves as a positive outcome.

biography.en:
Associated Names:
• Асано Инио
• 浅野一二〇

Name (in native language):
• 浅野いにお

Birth Date:
• September 22, 1980

Birth Place:
• Ibaraki, Japan

Previously worked as Takahashi Shin’s assistant on Saishuu Heiki Kanojo.

Asano created the acclaimed manga Solanin, which was released as a feature film in Japan in April 2010, starring Aoi Miyazaki. Known for creating character-driven, realist stories, ranging from slice of life to psychological horror, Asano won first prize in the 2001 GX competition for young manga artists. Yomiuri Shimbun described Asano as "one of the voices of his generation."

Satou Satsuki and Atsumori Ran were his assistants.

Married to Torikai Akane
